  <title>HotelConvTour_x</title>
  <abstract>A point layer of Clark County Casino Resorts, Resorts, Hotels, Timeshares, High Rise Residential, Hotel Meeting Facilities, and Convention Centers.
FacName - This is the full official name of the facility
Address - Address of the Facility
Name - Short or common name of the facility
Location - where in Clark County the facility is located: Boulder City, Downtown (Las Vegas), Henderson, Jean, Las Vegas Valley (includes Las Vegas, North Las Vegas, and Clark County), Laughlin, Mesquite, Mt Charleston, Primm, Strip (on Las Vegas Blvd), and Strip Corridor (in the resort corridor but not directly on Las Vegas Blvd).
FacType - This field will be either Primary or Secondary. Primary denotes that it is the primary point for that entire facility. For example, Mandalay Bay has multiple points on it's facility. Mandalay Bay is the Primary facilitiy and The Hotel, The Four Seasons, and the Convention Center are all Secondary facilities.
FacFeature - Casino, Casino Resort, Convention Center, High Rise Residential, Hotel, Hotel Meeting Facilities (over 100,000 square feet), Resort, and Timeshare
NumTowers - Total number of Towers for the facility. The number of towers is zero where the facility only has small buildings on the property, but not actual towers.
NumFloors - This field shows the highest number of floors for that facility. If there are multiple towers, this field will show only the number of floors for the tallest tower. Some facilities have multiple towers that all have the same number of floors.
NumUnits - The field shows to total number of rooms or units for that facility.
ConvSqFt - This field shows the total square footage for Convention Centers or Hotel Meeting Facilities.
Update - Date the information was last updated.


Delineates Clark County Casino Resorts, Resorts, Hotels, Timeshares, High Rise Residential, Hotel Meeting Facilities, and Convention Centers.
